name: dodgedash-io
description: Welcome to DodgeDash.io, an exciting game where you navigate through various areas, evade enemies, and save players to help them progress!

scripts.build: cd react && npm install && npm run build && xcopy /E /I /Y build ..\public
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd react && npm run start" "nodemon index.js"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd react && npm install

author: scar17off
